text: Kikai Sentai Zenkaiger is a Japanese television series. ==Production== This is the 45th in Toei's Super Sentai series. Also, it is the 2nd show made in the Reiwa era. Additionally, it commemorates the 45th anniversary of the Super Sentai franchise. It is also the 2nd special anniversary series following Kaizoku Sentai Gokaiger. ==Sequels== The show succeeded Mashin Sentai Kiramager, joining Kamen Rider Saber and later, Kamen Rider Revice in the Super Hero Time line-up on TV Asahi on March 7, 2021. A direct sequel, titled Avataro Sentai Donbrothers, aired after the finale. ==Characters== ===Zenkaiger=== Actor Name Zenkaiger Kiita Komagine Kaito Goshikida Zenkaizer Shintaro Asanuma Juran Zenkai Juran Yuki Kaji Gaon Zenkai Gaon Yume Miyamoto Magine Zenkai Magine Takuya Sato Vroon Zenkai Vroon Atsuki Mashiko Zocks Goldtsuiker Twokaizer Hinami Mori Flint Goldtsuiker Twokaiflint Ryo Sekoguchi Stacy StaCesar ==Cast== * Katio Goshikida / Zenkaizer: Kiita Komagine * Juran / Zenkai Juran (Voice): Shintarō Asanuma * Gaon / Zenkai Gaon (Voice): Yuki Kaji * Magine / Zenkai Magine (Voice): Yume Miyamoto * Vroon / Zenkai Vroon (Voice): Takuya Satō * Zocks Goldtsuiker / Twokaizer: Atsuki Mashiko * Flint Goldtsuiker / Twokaiflint: Hinami Mori * Stacy / StaCesar: Ryo Sekoguchi * Seechan (Voice): Misato Fukuen * Cutanner Goldtsuiker (Voice): Ryōta Suzuki * Ricky Goldtsuiker (Voice): Satsumi Matsuda * Isao Goshikida: Daijiro Kawaoka * Mitsuko Goshikida: Marie Kai * Yatsude Goshikada: Ikue Sakakibara * Zenkaiger Equipment Voice: Lenne Hardt * Geardalinger Voice: Tomokazu Seki * Zenryoku Zenkai Cannon Voice: Banjō Ginga * Narration: Goblin ===Guest cast=== * Reika Shindai / Kamen Rider Sabela (20): Mei Angela * Ryoga Shindai / Kamen Rider Durendal (20): Ken Shonozaki * Don Momotaro (Voice) (42): Kouhei Kiguchi ==Theme song== * "Zenryoku Zenkai!
